JobFullDesc:
Clarus Commerce is seeking an organized and motivated Marketing Operations Coordinator to join our Premium Loyalty MarOps team. This person will be responsible for the preparation and implementation of both web and email campaigns, as well as supporting the Marketing Operations team across multiple tools. You will work closely with the Testing, Product and Client Services teams to ensure that campaigns and emails are executed correctly. This position will report to the Manager of Marketing Operations.

Once the Company returns to the office in October, the MarOps Coordinator will have the opportunity to routinely work from home for part of the week.

Responsibilities of Marketing Operations Coordinator:


Implement, QA, and troubleshoot both web and email campaigns.
Develop working knowledge of MarTech platforms and technologies, such as Cheetah Digital, DoubleClick, Google Analytics, and Optimizely.
Stay up-to-date on the latest Marketing Technology trends and offerings.
Maintain any daily, weekly, or monthly reporting to support our product team and their needs.
Assist in technical issues related to MarTech tools.
Collaborate with internal teams to continuously streamline Marketing Operations processes.
Ensure the adherence of current marketing and technical standards, while continuing to keep up with new developments in this space.
Provide general support in all Marketing Operations areas as needed (i.e. Email Marketing Operations, UX Operations).
Desired Skills and Experience of Marketing Operations Coordinator:

 0-2 years digital marketing experience.
 Basic HTML/CSS skills.
 Basic Javascript knowledge (preferred).
 Ability to multi-task, in a fast-paced but FUN environment.
 Key time management skills and the ability to prioritize effectively.
 Detailed-oriented, strong organizational skills.
 Proficient in Microsoft Office.
 Direct experience working in MarTech tools including email marketing platforms (preferred).
 Self-directed and independent in both working and learning.
